property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only leonin clerics who can survive the Razor Fields for one turning of the suns can stand in the Cave of Light.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time I got there, the heart had stopped. Fortunately, I was able to replace it with something better."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each noncreature artifact is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library, then fateseal 2. (To fateseal 2, look at the top two cards of an opponent's library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player's library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The world is the body. The mana is the blood. The witch is the surgeon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.value: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather." - Rannon, Vithian holdout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a mannequin counter on it. For as long as that creature has a mannequin counter on it, it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This vulgar mimicry will end now." - Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will learn to earn death." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though you may see the same bones, you'll never see the same skeleton twice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know I accept only one currency here, and yet you have sought me out. Why now do you hesitate?" - Xathrid demon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each other player loses 2 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have become a gourmet of sorts. Each soul has its own distinctive flavor. The art is in inviting the right company to the feast."

property.value: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their skeletons can be found all over Skirk Ridge, tangled in each other's horns.

property.value: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her mind is an incredible mix of emotion and power. Even if I could grasp it, I couldn't hold it for long." - Jace Beleren, on Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.value: Dragon lords of Jund rule by edicts of flame.

property.value: Flying {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baby dragons can't figure out humans - if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My mind is the spread of the canopy. My heart is the embrace of the roots. I am deathless Llanowar, its fury and its peace."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are the grandest of all," said the archdruid to the trees. They became so proud of bark and branch that they suffered no creature to fly overhead or perch upon a bough.

property.value: The parched earth still shielded those few souls with the heart to call it home.

property.value: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

property.value: Such is the power of Rakdos that even his shadow takes on a cruel life of its own.

property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that." - Taani, berserker of Etlan

property.value: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast this spell. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creations made in madness may contain great power. The path to that power is as labyrinthine as the creator's mind.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.

property.value: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vampiric Dragon this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampiric Dragon. {1}{R}: Vampiric Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

property.value: {U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand. {1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Release that which was never caged." - Spellbomb inscription

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law - strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked. {T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Built with neither a way to steer nor a way to stop, the juggernauts were simply aimed at an enemy's best defenses and told to charge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Somehow it warps the Æther. It brings a strange weight, a blockade in the flow of spellcraft." - Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

property.value: {1}{U}{U}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. (This effect lasts indefinitely.) {3}{U}: Gain control of target artifact. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the blur between metal and flesh, Memnarch found madness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is a monument as austere, unyielding, and inscrutable as Esper itself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

property.value: Only a focused mind can survive it.

property.value: Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

property.value: Hideaway 4 (When this land enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.) Mosswort Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. Threshold - {G}{W}: Nantuko Monastery becomes a 4/4 green and white Insect Monk creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the autumn, she casts her seeds across the streets below, and come spring, her children rise in service to the Conclave.
